name: object-graph-as-json
description: Library for representing arbitrary javascript objects in JSON.

scripts.build:cjs: BABEL_MODULES=cjs babel src/ target/gen-src/ --out-dir target/cjs/ --ignore src/**/*.test.js
scripts.build:esm: BABEL_MODULES=false babel src/ target/gen-src/ --out-dir target/esm/ --ignore src/**/*.test.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run gen-src && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:umd

author: Jacob Williams <jacobaw@gmail.com>
